As you can see, I have play Counter Strike: Global Offensive for 3537 hours. 
This is not something I'm proud of, in fact, if I could take back those precious childhood/teenhood hours back, I would do it without hesitation. In all honesty, I can't tell you why I played it for so long, the community is toxic, the game is frustrating, there's a Russian screaming in my ear every 3 seconds or so, and because I'm in a low skill group, people often use SMGs exclusively and you have no idea how much it ticks me off.
Don't download this game. Save your money to buy something useful, something that won't hurt you mentally. Go outside.
